values.description: The Wwise authoring application, a graphical user interface that centralizes all aspects of audio creation. The authoring application is required to edit Wwise projects and to generate SoundBanks.
The Wwise authoring application along with the debug DLLs and symbols for plug-in developers.

The C++ include files and several configurations of the compiled libraries and symbols, which are required by both the Unity and Unreal Integrations. SDK code samples and documentation are also included.
The Wwise User Guide PDF and the Wwise Help CHM.

The C++ source code of the Wwise SDK. A license for the Source Code is required per Deployment Platform, the license status can be viewed in the Customer Portal. Contact Audiokinetic sales for more information.
A LUA interpreter with Wwise SDK bindings.
The award-winning LIMBO game with complete Wwise project and companion documentation.
A full open-source game with C++ source code, Wwise project, and companion documentation.
A Wwise Project and companion documentation demonstrating Wwise features.
